block.p: KUPIETZKY - Fannie. Lincoln Square Synagogue mourns with sorrow the passing of Mrs. Fannie Kupietzky, beloved mother of our member, Jonah Kupietzky, and grandmother of our members, Steven Kupietzky, and Neima Novetsky. May the family be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Adam Mintz, Rabbi Ken Cappell, President

KUPIETZKY-Fanny. American Friends of Yeshivot Bnei Akiva records with deep sorrow the passing of the beloved mother of our Board Member, Jonah Kupietzky. The Kupietzky family has been a staunch and avid supporter of AFYBA and all causes related to the State of Israel. May the family be consoled among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Dr. Irwin Kanarek, Co-President Alan Wildes, Co-President Rabbi David Warshaw, Exec Dir
